extendedInfo.description: Every year, thousands of children go missing. The FBIâs Child ID App can help.This free app provides a convenient place to electronically store photos and vital information about your children so that itâs literally right at hand if you need it. You can show the pictures and provide physical identifiers such as height and weight to security or police officers on the spot. Using a special tab on the app, you can also quickly and easily e-mail the information to authorities with a few clicks.The app includes tips on keeping children safe as well as specific guidance on what to do in those first few crucial hours after a child goes missing. Links to additional resources for families and victims are provided as well.Please be assured that no information on your child will be collected or stored by the FBI unless you provide it during an emergency.~Child ID Highlights~Organize Your Childâs Information- Create as many child profiles as you need.- Use your phone camera and photo library to take and upload photos of each child.- Add and update key identifying information.Know What To Do- Get safety tips on keeping your child out of harmâs way.- Learn what to do in first few critical hours after a child goes missing.- Visit additional links with resources for families and victims.Get Information to Authorities in an Emergency- Quickly call 911 or the National Center for Missing & Exploited Children.- E-mail your childâs pictures and information to authorities.- Show identifying information to security or law enforcement officers on the spot.

reviews.title: OK app. Tried to get fancy but failed.
reviews.comment: The \'tool\' for entering birth date is hosed.  Just keep it simple and let the user key the date.  Scrollers and fancy stuff is too hard for you.  Great concept though.
reviews.author: Trevor Stanhope

reviews.title: Keep it simple
reviews.comment: Saw the app in a news article and wanted to suggest it to my friends and family, however,  the way in which you input the child\'s birthday is more complicated than it needs to be. One,  I can\'t even see the input because the letters are a light grey instead of black on my Samsung galaxy iii. Two,  how do you even choose the year in which the child is born? I\'ll still recommend the app, but the birthday can be fixed to be a simple input boxes like the rest of the form.
reviews.author: Alyson Grace

reviews.title: Birthday Issue
reviews.comment: Every other comment mentions the Birthdate issue, and how you can\'t change it.  Some have said they figured it out, but they don\'t say how they did.  Comments from 2012 mention it.  Why wouldn\'t the developer fix one of the most important pieces of data.  Also, my husband and I have the same address as our child, put a button in to copy address or allow for \"same address\" instead of adding it three times.
reviews.author: Darlene Gerick

reviews.title: Password Protection not working
reviews.comment: It allows me to set the password but doesn\'t ask for it when I open the program our click on my child\'s profile (whichever it should do). Not comfortable with this information being available if someone steals my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: If it worked I would have kept it
reviews.comment: This is a great idea but had 2 uninstall app it would not allow me 2 access anything on my phone. It kept opening up on its own. Great idea & usefull tool if it worked
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: THE APP IS USEFUL
reviews.comment: THIS APP FOR NOW GETS ONLY 4 STAR\'S FOR NOW TILL THEY FIX THE WAY YOU ENTER YOU\'RE CHILDREN\'S BIRTHDATES. IF THEY CAN FIX THAT THEN I\'LL GIVE 5 STAR\'S THEN.
reviews.author: Leroy c.

reviews.title: Fix The DOB
reviews.comment: Please fix the date of birth! Can\'t select the correct date because you can\'t see it! Will be uninstalling the app if it doesn\'t get fixed
reviews.author: Sara Raub

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: I wasn\'t sure if it was going to work. Since alot have said the birth date didn\'t work. But u found that u have to go all the way back to the year they where born. It starts out in this year.  I think this is a great thing love this app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app for parents
reviews.comment: As a police officer who investigates missing & exploited children I highly recommend this app for parents. When a child goes missing most parents are too distraught to provide the basic information for a report. This app has everthing necessary for a report.
reviews.author: Dan Jackman

reviews.title: Great idea!
reviews.comment: Hopefully will never have to use this but there are some issues that need to be addressed. When entering multiple choice info the background and text has not enough contrast and its VERY hard to see. A similar problem lies with the addition of birth dates. You cant see a thing and you sort of just blindly fumble until hopefully the very dim birthday matches. It took me forever and im surprised that I was able to enter the correct date especially the year it sort of just appeared. So please fix issues.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost...
reviews.comment: I have a Galaxy S3. This app is great other than the fact that you can\'t enter a birth date. This is rather crucial information. I had to write it out under the \"additional comments\" area. Fix this and you\'d have a 5 star app!!
reviews.author: Amber Huse

reviews.title: Puzzled
reviews.comment: Although the app appears that it could be helpful I also had an issue with trying to add the DOB information and I had a lot of concerns of entering all the personal information on the child as well as myself for this reason.....what if  my phone gets misplaced and into the hands of another and all my childs as well as the gaurdians information is in the phone.  I did see where a password can be created and it could be locked and unlocked. However, I am not sure if this is the app or my phone but with my phone I would touch the lock and it indicates on or off but the created password still shows (it\'s just grayed out). What would be the purpose of creating a PW if I  lock it and someone gets a hold of my phone and retouches the  indicated lock to unlock  with the password already in view.  Therefore, I would only enter information such as the City, state and zip code, son. first name, my first name, all phone numbers ect.. Not sure how this will assist me using the app. Just being cautious about where I put my personal information.   That needs some more thought put into it. But overall I will give a rating as a 3
reviews.author: Johnetta Lassiter

reviews.title: Too many bugs
reviews.comment: Same problem as other users with the font in birthday field. Running a Samsung galexy s 3. The state pick list has the same problem as the birthday field. Good idea but too many glitches. The distinguishing characteristics area cuts off before the end of the field.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Birthday can be tricky but love the app
reviews.comment: Love this, the birthday was kind of tricky to enter cause of the way it is set up but once I figured it out it worked fine. Also it would be nice if you could enter more in the characteristic section per entry, I wanted to put \"freckle on top of right foot\" and had to shorten it to \"freckle top right foot\" not a big deal for me but if I had to describe something larger it could have been. I love this app but hope I never need it further then data entry.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Smart App
reviews.comment: Love the idea of this, I wouldn\'t be calm enough to think of identifying marks on my kids. However, the birthday section is a HUGE problem. You cant see it, and you can only select month and current year \"2013\" DOB is a big deal pease fix.
reviews.author: Summer Bara

reviews.title: Android needs work
reviews.comment: DOB and other options do not work well on android. Recommend addind ability to include multiple photos.
reviews.author: Doug Brown

reviews.title: Very Poor UI
reviews.comment: Cannot enter date of birth due to color scheme. Same with state dropdown box. Unfortunate but will need to uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: This is an easy app to use,  I\'ve had no trouble with any part of it. Love the safety info too, sat with my children and discussed it all together. Thx for this app!!
reviews.author: Cheyenne Rose

reviews.title: Unusable on 4.2.2
reviews.comment: Can\'t see the text in front of the background. Birthday and month are barely visible and cannot see birth year at all. I would love to use this app but cannot.
reviews.author: Matthew Howard

reviews.title: B-day stinks
reviews.comment: The B-day section is horrible, needs a revamp!
reviews.author: A Google User
